title: Truck full of VB crashes, spilling load all over the road
text:
A beer truck filled with Victoria Bitter has crashed on a busy highway, spilling tonnes of lager across the road.

The crash happened on Pacific Highway on the NSW Mid North Coast, on Tuesday.

Pictures of the incident show piles of boxes strewn across the road.

A beer truck filled with Victoria Bitter has crashed on a busy highway, spilling tonnes of lager across the road

Passerby have expressed their heartache at the incredible scene. Many social media users have even offered to help with the clean up.

Emergency crews are at the scene.

Two southbound lanes on the Pacific Highway, approaching Manning River Drive have been closed while the clean up begins.
description:
A beer truck filled with VB has crashed on a busy highway, spilling tonnes of lager across the road. 
The crash happened on Pacific Highway on the NSW Mid North Coast, on Tuesday.
authors: Kelsey Wilkie For Daily Mail Australia
